caption.p: Effect of Cardamom oil on Morris water maze test in AlCl 3-induced neurotoxicity in rats. Data are expressed as mean Â± SEM ( n = 6), ### p < 0.001 when compared with normal control, ** p < 0.01, *** P < 0.001 when compared with disease control group. AlCl 3, Aluminum chloride; SEM, Standard Error of Mean.
